General.Name: Impulsora del Desarrollo y el Empleo en América Latina S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Impulsora del Desarrollo y el Empleo en América Latina, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, engages in the development of infrastructure projects in Mexico and Latin America. It is involved in the construction, operation, and maintenance of road concessions; operation of wastewater treatment and hydroelectric plants, and multimodal terminals; parking and social rehabilitation centers operations; investment of financial instruments; and provision of electronic toll collection system, as well as leasing of equipment. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Avenida Paseo de las Palmas, no. 781, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 11000
